summary:
Hein84 did a wonderful work with his Vivid Landscape mod series. But for me, the gravel tundra texture is a bit too squared.
So I did a little patch for my game, and now I'm sharing it.
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Vivid Landscapes - Volcanic Area patch
By Xtudo
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Description
===========
Hein84 did a wonderful work with his Vivid Landscape mod series.
But for me, the gravel tundra texture is a bit too squared.
So I did a little patch for my game, and now I'm sharing it.

ChangeLog
===========
Ver 0.1 - Release

Installation
=============
1. It's simples.Â 
Extract the downloaded RAR file, and copy the DATA folder to your Skyrim installation folder, overwrite.

Requeriments
=============
- Vivid Landscapes - Volcanic Area
Here: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41198/?

Licensing/Legal
===============
- Thanks to Hein84 for his awesome work.
- Many thanks to Bethesda for making such a piece of art! I love you guys/gals! :D
author: Xtudo
